name: This Is A Stable Game
description:
a&d or arrows to move.

Space to jump.

This game is easy, (Yeah, like, my roommate took an hour to beat it)but I will still leave tips. So play the game first before you see what's down here.

********Spoilers Below*********

Level 2: Just take a leap of faith: but in the right spot.

Level 3: If something can be a rooftop,then it can also be?

By this time you will have learnt everything you need to know to finish the game. But,

Level 8:In case you got stuck in the upper left corner, just look around. I promise you this game is designed to be finished. Why does everyone tend to ignore the corner?

By the way, if you didn't try to skip our conversation, you'd be happy to know that those who press Esc to skip will press Space twice more than you.
